body_html:
Testing this on master gives this more descriptive error message:

The problem is that you should change the nn.BatchNorm1d module to live on the GPU because it has weights that are initialized on the cpu:

import torch
from torch.autograd import Variable
a = Variable(torch.randn(2,5).cuda(), requires_grad=True)
batchnorm = torch.nn.BatchNorm1d(5).cuda()
y = batchnorm(a)

body:
Testing this on master gives this more descriptive error message:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5652049/33382285-57f1cfc6-d4ee-11e7-930c-7ae29d5bf32e.png)

The problem is that you should change the `nn.BatchNorm1d` module to live on the GPU because it has weights that are initialized on the cpu:

```
import torch
from torch.autograd import Variable
a = Variable(torch.randn(2,5).cuda(), requires_grad=True)
batchnorm = torch.nn.BatchNorm1d(5).cuda()
y = batchnorm(a)
```
